description: Try our easy to follow Flipz Milk Chocolate Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Flipz Milk Chocolate Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove cheesecake from pan and place on a serving plate. Gently press Flipz into side of cheesecake. Whip remaining cream and pile on top. Use caramel topping, remaining Flipz and chocolate digestives to decorate.
